The Pandemic Tracking Collective (PTC) is a research group dedicated to tracking and reporting public health data. Our expertise includes emerging infectious diseases, immunology, virology, clinical medicine, epidemiology, science communication, data science, data infrastructure, and data visualization. The founding members of PTC are all former leads and key contributors from [The COVID Tracking Project](https://covidtracking.com/).
